overview: Pack your shit and hold on tight, because we've got a massive collection of sexy schoolgirls gone bad in plaid! Ava Rose, Riley Shy, Jamie Elle, Karina Kay, Franchezca Valentina, and more cramming cuties are about to engage in some hands-on sexual education. They've got their skirts hiked up and legs spread open to give you an unforgettable 4 hours of sexy schoolgirl fun!
title: Bad in Plaid
